Reviews.Title: Only one camera at a time?
Reviews.Author: t7
Reviews.Content: I bought this system at a local acehardware.  Come to find out you can only view or record one camera at a time, there is only one video in.  There is a remote to switch back and forth.This is terrible, not sure why anyone would want this unless they sit in front of the cameras 24 hours a day.  I took this product back.

Reviews.Title: POS cameras
Reviews.Author: Gigabyte
Reviews.Content: The video was really bad and you can only use one camera at a time.  I guess they expect you to switch back and forth manually either with the remote (that did not work) or by hitting a button on the receiver.  The whole setup is horrible.  Looked to good to be true and it was

Reviews.Title: Used for observering students.
Reviews.Author: pean
Reviews.Content: The cameras work well but pick up a lot of static in our building. It's good enough to satisfy my principle examiner.

ProductInfo.Name: First Alert A-560 Wireless Analog Cameras With Receiver
